CustomField.formula:
IF( SBQQ__ProductCode__c = 'H' && (SBQQ__ProductFamily__c = 'Rolloff' && MID( Source_Code__c , 0, 2) = 'WM' && (Pricing_Request__r.Customer_Price_Type__c != 'Exhibit Pricing' && Pricing_Request__r.Customer_Price_Type__c != 'Exhibit Cost Pricing'))
, IF( SBQQ__UnitCost__c < $CustomMetadata.Pricing_Threshold_Settings__mdt.Price_Per_Haul.Minimum_Value__c , 'Haul Cost is < $' & TEXT($CustomMetadata.Pricing_Threshold_Settings__mdt.Price_Per_Haul.Minimum_Value__c) & ', please confirm or re-procure if required.' , IF(SBQQ__UnitCost__c > $CustomMetadata.Pricing_Threshold_Settings__mdt.Price_Per_Haul.Maximum_Value__c , 'Haul Cost is > $' & TEXT($CustomMetadata.Pricing_Threshold_Settings__mdt.Price_Per_Haul.Maximum_Value__c) & ', please confirm or re-procure if required.' , '') ) , '')
CustomField.label: Cost Compare Message
